Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We're offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $14,500, which we believe is a fair and competitive offer considering its worth to you. We're confident that once you experience its benefits, you'll see the true value it brings. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to ask. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
